com.steffbeard.totalwar.modules.crops.utils

Class Fruits

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.steffbeard.totalwar.modules.crops.utils.Fruits

  • public class Fruits
extends Object
    Fruit related helper functions. This could be optimized: convert this into non-static, and create and instance per check that caches surrounding block materials etc.
